metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon
metas.description: Similar to Brave and Kung Fu Panda, this animated adventure features dragons, friendship, and overcoming differences.

metas.name: Klaus
metas.description: A heartwarming and visually stunning animated film with humor and a unique origin story, reminiscent of the charm in Spirited Away and Coco.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: A delightful family comedy with a charming protagonist and adventurous spirit, much like The Borrowers and Ace Ventura for its comedic adventure.

metas.name: Paddington 2
metas.description: Continues the delightful adventures and humor of the first film, offering more family-friendly comedy and charm.

metas.name: The Mitchells vs. The Machines
metas.description: A quirky and action-packed animated adventure with a unique family dynamic and humor, similar to Zootopia and Kung Fu Panda.

metas.name: Kubo and the Two Strings
metas.description: A visually breathtaking animated adventure with a strong fantasy element, echoing the magic of Spirited Away and the adventure of Brave.

metas.name: Raya and the Last Dragon
metas.description: An epic animated adventure with strong female leads, themes of unity, and impressive action, akin to Tangled and Puss in Boots.

metas.name: Moana
metas.description: A musical adventure with a strong protagonist, beautiful animation, and themes of destiny, similar to Tangled and Coco.

metas.name: Shrek
metas.description: A classic animated comedy with plenty of humor and adventure, appealing to the same sense of fun as Kung Fu Panda and Brave.

metas.name: Shrek 2
metas.description: Continues the hilarious adventures and witty humor of the original, making it a great follow-up for fans of animated comedies.

metas.name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
metas.description: A wonderfully charming and witty stop-motion animated film with a whimsical adventure, reminiscent of Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: The Lego Movie
metas.description: An incredibly inventive and funny animated movie with a fast-paced adventure and great gags, aligning with the comedic adventure of Zootopia.

metas.name: The Lego Batman Movie
metas.description: A hilarious and action-packed animated spin-off with a unique comedic style, similar to the fun of Kung Fu Panda and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
metas.description: A groundbreaking animated film with incredible visuals, exciting action, and a strong story, offering an adventure similar to the excitement of Sonic and Zootopia.

metas.name: Encanto
metas.description: A vibrant and musical animated film with a focus on family, magic, and self-discovery, echoing the themes of Coco and Sing.

metas.name: Despicable Me
metas.description: A fun and funny animated adventure with a charismatic villain turned hero, similar to the appeal of The Bad Guys and Kung Fu Panda.

metas.name: Despicable Me 2
metas.description: Continues the hilarious antics of Gru and the Minions with more adventure and heartwarming moments.

metas.name: Hotel Transylvania
metas.description: A fun and quirky animated comedy with monsters and a focus on family and friendship, a good fit for fans of animated comedies.

metas.name: Hotel Transylvania 2
metas.description: More comedic monster fun with a focus on family, maintaining the lighthearted and adventurous tone.

metas.name: The Iron Giant
metas.description: A beloved animated classic with themes of friendship and acceptance, with a touching story and adventure elements.

metas.name: Ratatouille
metas.description: A charming animated film about pursuing dreams with a touch of whimsical adventure and great humor, fitting the spirit of Spirited Away and Kung Fu Panda.

metas.name: Up
metas.description: An heartwarming animated adventure with a fantastical journey and a blend of humor and emotion, similar to the adventurous spirit of Tangled.

metas.name: Wreck-It Ralph
metas.description: A creative and exciting animated adventure that explores the world of video games with humor and heart, akin to Zootopia and Sonic.

metas.name: Wreck-It Ralph 2: Ralph Breaks the Internet
metas.description: Continues the fun and imaginative journey into the digital world with more humor and character development.

metas.name: Monsters, Inc.
metas.description: A funny and imaginative animated adventure with memorable characters and a unique world, appealing to the same audience as Kung Fu Panda.

metas.name: Monsters University
metas.description: A prequel that offers more humor and adventure, exploring the early days of the beloved monsters.

metas.name: The Princess and the Frog
metas.description: A charming animated musical adventure with a strong princess and a touch of magic, fitting the genre of Tangled and Brave.

metas.name: Mary Poppins
metas.description: A classic live-action musical fantasy with magical adventures and memorable songs, reminiscent of the whimsical elements in Spirited Away and Tangled.

metas.name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
metas.description: A timeless family adventure film with themes of friendship and wonder, offering a heartwarming story similar to the spirit of The Borrowers.

metas.name: The Parent Trap
metas.description: A fun and lighthearted family comedy with a clever premise and plenty of laughs, aligning with the comedy of Ace Ventura and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Home Alone
metas.description: A classic family comedy filled with slapstick humor and inventive traps, appealing to the comedic adventure of The Borrowers and Ace Ventura.

metas.name: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
metas.description: Continues the hilarious antics and comedic adventures of Kevin McCallister.

metas.name: Chicken Run
metas.description: A charming stop-motion animated adventure comedy with a great sense of humor and a compelling escape plan, similar to Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
metas.description: More delightful stop-motion animated adventures from the beloved duo, full of wit and charm.

metas.name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
metas.description: A magical adventure set in the Wizarding World, offering fantasy and wonder similar to Spirited Away and The Borrowers.

metas.name: Song of the Sea
metas.description: A beautifully animated fantasy adventure with Irish folklore and a touching story, echoing the magic of Spirited Away.

metas.name: Big Hero 6
metas.description: A fun animated superhero adventure with humor, heart, and cool technology, similar to the action and comedy of Zootopia and Sonic.

metas.name: The Croods
metas.description: A prehistoric animated adventure comedy with a focus on family and survival, offering humor and excitement like Kung Fu Panda.

metas.name: The Croods: A New Age
metas.description: Continues the hilarious and adventurous journey of the Crood family with new characters and challenges.

metas.name: Arthur Christmas
metas.description: A funny and heartwarming animated adventure about delivering presents, with a unique premise and plenty of comedic moments.
